description: Rich Text Editor is included with IBM WebSphere Portal, WebSphere Portal Express, Lotus Quickr, and Lotus Expeditor.
NOTE: Temporary ORT files are saved in the following location: app_server_root\profiles\Profile_Name\temp\server_cell_name\server_type\odc \RichTextEditor.war\cds\Session_Id\filename.ort.
These files serve as backup files and can be recovered if the server session unexpectedly closes.
